name: Quick Draw
description: The character can draw a weapon as a free action.

name: Simple Weapons Proficiency
description: Subject can use simple weapons normally.

name: Medium Armor Proficiency
description: Subject can wear medium armor without penalty.

name: Rapid Reload
description: Weapon may be reloaded as a free or move action

name: Far Shot
description: When the character uses a firearm or archaic ranged weapon, its range increment increases by one-half (multiply by 1.5). When the character throws a weapon, its range increment is doubled.

name: Point Blank Shot
description: +1 attack +1 damage on ranged attacks within 30 feet

name: Precise Shot
description: No penalty for shooting into melee

name: Drive-by Attack
description: The character takes no vehicle speed penalty when making an attack while in a moving vehicle. Also, if the character is the driver, he or she can take his or her attack action to make an attack at any point along the vehicle's movement.

name: Double Tap
description: When using a semiautomatic firearm with at least two bullets loaded, the character may fire two bullets as a single attack against a single target. The character receives a â€“2 penalty on this attack, but deals +1 die of damage with a successful hit. Using this feat fires two bullets and can only be done if the weapon has two bullets in it.
